I'm a Ph.D. in linguistics from UC San Diego. I am currently a post-doctoral fellow at UCLA under the supervision of [Patricia Keating](https://linguistics.ucla.edu/people/keating/keating.htm). My research interests are in language documentation, voice quality, and second language acquisition.
